title: How Algeria is Crafting a Dynamic Economy for Tomorrow
description: As the first light breaks over the Port of Algiers, cranes hum to life above stacks of containers. "A decade ago, 90% of these ships carried oil and gas," remarks a port worker, gesturing toward vessels being loaded with fertilizers, steel coils, and crates of dates. title: China-Algeria Trade Hits USD 4.5B as Partnership Deepens
description:
Algeria’s Industry Minister voiced strong support for deeper China-Algeria economic cooperation at the Algeria-China Business Forum in Algiers.

Over 1,300 Chinese companies operate in Algeria, with USD 12.5 billion trade and USD 4.5 billion investments approved since 2022.
